SourcedStatement: Back from his scoring flurry in a triumphant Paris Games for the United States and back on regular family duty before the new NBA season begins, Curry can reflect on the highs and lows of his year — with one notable joy being the addition of his fourth child with wife Ayesha, baby boy Caius Chai born May 11.
Name: United States
Justification: Back from his scoring flurry in a triumphant Paris Games for the United States.

SourcedStatement: Five years into their foundation work, the Currys announced Thursday a commitment to raise and invest $25 million over the next five years devoted to literacy programs that will provide one-on-one tutoring for children who are at least two grade levels behind in reading.
Name: Eat.Learn.Play. Foundation
Justification: Five years into their foundation work, the Currys announced Thursday a commitment to raise and invest $25 million over the next five years devoted to literacy programs.

SourcedStatement: “Everything happens for a reason and the journey gives you all type of different experiences along the way,” the 36-year-old Curry said Wednesday before hosting a charity golf tournament benefiting the couple’s Eat.Learn.Play. Foundation devoted to Oakland schools.
Name: Stephen Curry
Title: NBA player
Justification: the 36-year-old Curry said Wednesday before hosting a charity golf tournament benefiting the couple’s Eat.Learn.Play. Foundation devoted to Oakland schools.

SourcedStatement: “It’s the same way I appreciate all the things I get to do on and off the court where it’s all connected,” Curry said.
Name: Stephen Curry
Title: NBA player

SourcedStatement: “What’s interesting is it’s never been a one and done and we’ve always slow rolled things out because we love to build a model that kind of proves itself and can stand on its own,” Ayesha Curry said, acknowledging she observes her own children’s learning styles and how much she wants to support those without the same resources.
Name: Ayesha Curry
Title: co-founder of Eat.Learn.Play. Foundation
Justification: Ayesha Curry said, acknowledging she observes her own children’s learning styles and how much she wants to support those without the same resources.

SourcedStatement: These students have been part of a pilot tutoring program through the Currys’ foundation that is again expanding its reach in Oakland Unified School District after efforts last year included the revitalization of six schoolyards.
Name: students
Justification: These students have been part of a pilot tutoring program through the Currys’ foundation.

SourcedStatement: Wade, an 8-year-old in third grade, said she would remember this day golfing with Curry “for 15 years,” and that her favorite part of the visit was “everything.”
Name: Wade
